summary: Tested Job Application Form (ApplyJob) for HR SaaS platform. Fixed critical CORS issue with wilayah.id API by implementing backend proxy. All requested features verified working: 15 form fields render, Pendidikan dropdown has 5 options, cascading Wilayah dropdowns (Provinsi->Kota->Kecamatan->Kelurahan) load 38 provinces, salary field has Rp prefix and thousand separator formatting.
passed_tests: All 15 fields render: Nama Lengkap, Email, No. Telepon, Tempat Lahir, Tanggal Lahir, Pendidikan Terakhir, Jurusan, Provinsi, Kota/Kab, Kecamatan, Kelurahan, Alamat Lengkap, Gaji yang Diharapkan, Pengalaman Kerja, Upload CV
Pendidikan Terakhir dropdown has 5 options: SMA/SMK, D3, S1, S2, S3
Provinsi dropdown loads 38 provinces from wilayah.id via backend proxy
Cascading Province -> City works (DKI Jakarta -> 6 cities)
Cascading City -> District works (Jakarta Selatan -> 10 kecamatan)
Cascading District -> Village works (Cilandak -> kelurahan list)
Gaji field uses inputMode=numeric for numeric keyboard
Gaji field formats with thousand separator (5000000 -> 5.000.000)
Form validation shows error when CV not uploaded
Submit button 'Kirim Lamaran' is present and clickable

bugs_fixed.issue: CORS error: wilayah.id API blocked by browser CORS policy
files_modified: /app/frontend/src/pages/ApplyJob.jsx (updated API calls to use backend proxy)

seed_data_creation: No seed data created - using existing job posting
context_for_next_testing_agent: Job application form now uses backend proxy for wilayah.id API to bypass CORS. Proxy endpoints: /api/wilayah/provinces, /api/wilayah/regencies/{code}, /api/wilayah/districts/{code}, /api/wilayah/villages/{code}. Form fields are dynamically loaded from /api/public/careers/{domain}/jobs/{job_id} endpoint. All cascading dropdowns tested and working.

fields_list: Gaji yang Diharapkan (number with Rp prefix)

wilayah_cascading.tested_cascade: DKI Jakarta -> Kota Administrasi Jakarta Selatan -> Cilandak -> Cilandak Barat
